entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
